raw: * DOM and widget independent method to compute the location
* of an object to make it relative to any other object.
* @param size {Map} With the keys width and height
*   of the object to align
* @param area {Map} Available area to position the object. Has the keys
* width and height. Normally this is the parent
*   object of the one to align.
* @param target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map
* should have the keys left, top, right
* and bottom.
* @param offsets {Map} Map with all offsets for each direction.
* Comes with the keys left, top,
* right and bottom.
* @param position {String} Alignment of the object on the target, any of
*   "top-left", "top-center", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-center", "bottom-right",
*   "left-top", "left-middle", "left-bottom", "right-top", "right-middle", "right-bottom".
* @param modeX {String} Horizontal placement mode. Valid values are:
*   <ul>

*
  • direct: place the object directly at the given
* location.

*
  • keep-align: if parts of the object is outside of the visible
*   area it is moved to the best fitting 'edge' and 'alignment' of the target.
*   It is guaranteed the the new position attaches the object to one of the
* target edges and that that is aligned with a target edge.

*
  • best-fit
    • : If parts of the object are outside of the visible
*   area it is moved into the view port ignoring any offset, and position
*   values.
* @param modeY {String} Vertical placement mode. Accepts the same values as
*   the 'modeX' argument.
* @return {Map} A map with the final location stored in the keys
* left and top.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: DOM and widget independent method to compute the location of an object to make it relative to any other object.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: size {Map} With the keys width and height of the object to align
@param.description: With the keys width and height of the object to align

@param.name: @param
@param.body: area {Map} Available area to position the object. Has the keys width and height. Normally this is the parent object of the one to align.
@param.description: Available area to position the object. Has the keys width and height. Normally this is the parent object of the one to align.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys left, top, right and bottom.
@param.description: Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys left, top, right and bottom.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: offsets {Map} Map with all offsets for each direction. Comes with the keys left, top, right and bottom.
@param.description: Map with all offsets for each direction. Comes with the keys left, top, right and bottom.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
position {String} Alignment of the object on the target, any of
   "top-left", "top-center", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-center", "bottom-right",
   "left-top", "left-middle", "left-bottom", "right-top", "right-middle", "right-bottom".
@param.description:
Alignment of the object on the target, any of
   "top-left", "top-center", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-center", "bottom-right",
   "left-top", "left-middle", "left-bottom", "right-top", "right-middle", "right-bottom".

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modeX {String} Horizontal placement mode. Valid values are:
  • direct: place the object directly at the given location.
  • keep-align: if parts of the object is outside of the visible area it is moved to the best fitting 'edge' and 'alignment' of the target. It is guaranteed the the new position attaches the object to one of the target edges and that that is aligned with a target edge.
  • best-fit
    • : If parts of the object are outside of the visible area it is moved into the view port ignoring any offset, and position values.
@param.description:
Horizontal placement mode. Valid values are:
  • direct: place the object directly at the given location.
  • keep-align: if parts of the object is outside of the visible area it is moved to the best fitting 'edge' and 'alignment' of the target. It is guaranteed the the new position attaches the object to one of the target edges and that that is aligned with a target edge.
  • best-fit
    • : If parts of the object are outside of the visible area it is moved into the view port ignoring any offset, and position values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modeY {String} Vertical placement mode. Accepts the same values as
   the 'modeX' argument.
@param.description:
Vertical placement mode. Accepts the same values as
   the 'modeX' argument.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with the final location stored in the keys left and top.
@return.description: A map with the final location stored in the keys left and top.

raw: * Get the axis implementation for the given mode
* @param mode {String} One of direct, keep-align or
* best-fit
* @return {qx.util.placement.AbstractAxis}

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the axis implementation for the given mode
